title: Opinion: We wrote the HHS review on treatment for minors with gender dysphoria. We hope our critics actually read our report
description: “Medical professionals should look past the partisan framing and engage with the substance of this debate,” write the authors of the HHS review on treating minors with gender dysphoria.
content: “Medical professionals should look past the partisan framing and engage with the substance of this debate,” write the authors of the HHS review on treating minors with gender dysphoria.
